channel.title: how much would you pay if BM wasn't free?
channel.description:
well I myself would pay max 20$, I just don't think paying for game more is right. I just have more important things to spend money on...
p.s. yes i know that some of you would pay 99999999999k but try to remain realists.

item.title: how much would you pay if BM wasn't free?
item.dc:creator: Nightblade
item.description:
Dr Zoidcrab:

Id pay £70 for the special edition, with the soundtrack and mini hl encyclopedia, and all the little plastic replicas of the characters

Ooh that’s awesome. Why tease us with things we’ll never have! :’(

Soundtrack will be released for free. Though it would be the decent thing to donate a (large) penny or two to Joel. Odd that he can accept donations and you guys can’t. What’s the technicality behind that?

Read full topic
item.source: how much would you pay if BM wasn't free?

item.title: how much would you pay if BM wasn't free?
item.dc:creator: shadowscrawl
item.description:
I have been anticipating this mod for a long time and at this point there’s no way I would allow myself not to have it and since I think pirating a game made by such a small team is about the most despicable scumbag thing you can do (its not exactly like your ripping money out of the pockets of some fat cat at EA) I would happily pay whatever was asked.

item.title: how much would you pay if BM wasn't free?
item.dc:creator: MRPolo
item.description:
I am a patient bastard. If the game was to be released at the usual big hit price (around 40 Great Bri’ish Poonds Sherlings ) I’d wait about 6 more months. By that time all the easter eggs would be found, all the spoilers spoilt, and the price would drop by about half to 3 quarters (depending on how successful it is) then I would buy it and enjoy the game as slowly as it may take, raping the graphics off. And once I have finished, I will play again, this time with the use of spoilers and cheats etc.
I have it all here, in my hollow head

Read full topic
item.source: how much would you pay if BM wasn't free?
